code: import axios from'axios';const apiClient=axios.create({baseURL:'http://127.0.0.1:8000/api',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}});export const getProjects=()=>apiClient.get('/projects');export const getSprints=projectName=>apiClient.post('/sprints',{project_name:projectName});export const getUserStories=(projectName,sprintPath)=>apiClient.post('/userstories',{project_name:projectName,sprint_path:sprintPath});export const generateGherkin=userStoryDescription=>apiClient.post('/generate-gherkin',{user_story_description:userStoryDescription});export const createTask=(projectName,userStoryId,title,description)=>apiClient.post('/create-task',{project_name:projectName,user_story_id:userStoryId,title:title,description:description});
